com.logfiles.entrypoint

Class LogFileResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logfiles.entrypoint.LogFileResource

  • @Path(value="logfiles/api/v1/files")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class LogFileResource
extends Object
    Class that is the entry point to handle REST-API request over 1. http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files/ 2. http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files/{filename}
    Author:
    alexdel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String defaultDir
      Default log directory
      private String hosts
      Hosts list separate by commas to be reached by a REST-API request to query a single file or all files in its local log directory
      (package private) javax.ws.rs.client.Client jerseyClient
      Jersey client to makes REST-API requests
      private String keyword
      Filter keyword to be apply over the lines selected
      (package private) LogFileDirectory logFileDirectory
      Controller reference to backend for a directory
      (package private) LogFileReader logFileReader
      Controller reference to backend for a single file
      private Integer nLines
      Number of lines to be read
      private Integer orderBy
      File read on ascendant or descendant way
      private Long startPos
      File cursor position since the reading will start

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogFileResource

        public LogFileResource(javax.ws.rs.client.Client jerseyClient,
                       String defaultDir,
                       Long startPos,
                       Integer nLines,
                       Integer orderBy,
                       String hosts)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        jerseyClient - Jersey client
        defaultDir - Default log directory
        startPos - Files read from cursor position
        nLines - Number of lines to be read
        orderBy - File read on ascendant(0) or descendant way(1). Default descendant
        hosts - Host list separated by commas to be query.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllLogFiles

        @GET
 @Timed
public List<Host> getAllLogFiles(@QueryParam(value="n_lines")
                                                com.google.common.base.Optional<Integer> nLines,
                                                @QueryParam(value="keyword")
                                                com.google.common.base.Optional<String> keyword,
                                                @QueryParam(value="order_by")
                                                com.google.common.base.Optional<Integer> orderBy,
                                                @HeaderParam(value="X-hosts")
                                                com.google.common.base.Optional<String> hosts)
        Entry point for http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files/ Allows the following usage: 1. Header host parameter to specify another host to be query. 2. http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files/ 3. http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files[?n_lines={#lines}[&keyword={keyword}[&orderBy={0|1}]]]
        Parameters:
        nLines - Number of lines to be read
        keyword - keyword filter over the lines read.
        orderBy - Reading on ascendant (0) and descendant(1)
        hosts - Host list separate by comma to be query by REST-API request
        Returns:

      • getLogFile

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{fileName}")
 @Timed
public List<Host> getLogFile(@NotNull @PathParam(value="fileName")
                                                                         @NotNull String fileName,
                                                                         @QueryParam(value="start_pos")
                                                                         com.google.common.base.Optional<Long> startPos,
                                                                         @QueryParam(value="n_lines")
                                                                         com.google.common.base.Optional<Integer> nLines,
                                                                         @QueryParam(value="keyword")
                                                                         com.google.common.base.Optional<String> keyword,
                                                                         @QueryParam(value="order_by")
                                                                         com.google.common.base.Optional<Integer> orderBy,
                                                                         @HeaderParam(value="X-hosts")
                                                                         com.google.common.base.Optional<String> hosts)
        Entry point for http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files/{filename} Allows the following usage: 1. Header host parameter to specify another host to be query. 2. http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files/{filename} 3. http://[domain]/logfiles/api/v1/files[?n_lines={#lines}[&keyword={keyword}[&orderBy={0|1}[&start_pos={long_number}]]]]
        Parameters:
        fileName - Filename looked
        startPos - File cursor reference since the reading will start
        nLines - Number of lines to be read
        keyword - Keyword filter to filter lines read.
        orderBy - Reading on ascendant(0) or descendant(1)
        hosts - Hosts list header parameter separated by comma to look the file through a REST-API request
        Returns:
